mapper.select: select count(iho.count) from itrip_hotel_order iho where iho.roomId=#{roomId} and date_format(iho.checkInDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= date_format(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(iho.checkOutDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= date_format(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and iho.orderStatus in (0, 2)
